content.protection: 2 bolts with SMC hangers. Small to medium nuts and tricams. Gear anchor.
content.location: Right of the large crack, runs up the hump past two horizontal cracks. Walk off left.

content.description: Climb slick slab to lie back corner. Climb corner past tree up low angle slab to top!
content.protection: Double #1 cams and some smaller cams, gear anchor 15’ climbers left of the bolted anchor for dueling hammers. small nuts for anchor.
content.location: Look directly left of dueling hammers and you will see 3 cracks. This is the middle lie back crack.

content.description: Start on slick looking but very grippy slab. Start in crack and continue up until your level with tree then trend right to to top.
content.protection: Singles .3 - 1 and some nuts. Gear anchor about 15’ climbers left of the bolted anchor and chains for dueling hammers.
content.location: Look directly left of the dueling hammers route and you will see 3 short crack lines. Climb the furthest left next to the lie back corner.

content.description: North Side of Spaghetti Wall Area.   Good granite, not as flaky as Lost Bandana Wall.
